participant_1.background:
I went to a bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.
i love the smell of leather.
i have trouble losing weight.
I saw a blue whale when I went to the aquarium.
I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.

participant_2.background:
I immerse myself in the smell of my favorite soap to find solace.
i like to read.
I like to eat apples because they are healthy and sweet.
I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
i own a cat.

content.text: Hi Joe, I'm Jane.  What was your favorite part of your day today?
I went to the bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.  What was yours?
I like to read and I spent some time reading a new book I just got.  What's your favorite book?
The sound of a classic car engine is like music to my ears.
I immerse myself in the smell of my favorite soap to find solace.
I have trouble losing weight.  What's your favorite healthy snack?
I like to eat apples because they are healthy and sweet.
I saw a blue whale when I went to the aquarium.
I have a cat.  What's your favorite animal?
I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.
That's really cool!  I wish I could sing
